conbody.p: (a) Sample offering letter is located at https://www.ditco.disa.mil/DitcoContractingTemplates under Small Business Guides and Templates.

(S-90) Prior to requesting release of a requirement from the 8(a) program, coordinate with OSBP. Sample 8(a) release letter and package requirements are located at https://www.ditco.disa.mil/DitcoContractingTemplates
under Small Business Guides and Templates.
